Finds a bot based on its name.

The name or title of the new document.

The file to upload (e.g., txt, md, rtf,: The file to upload (e.g., txt, md, rtf, pdf, ppt, docx).
The message to send to the conversation. (Max 2000 characters)
The name for the new conversation.
